sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"害怕的，怕的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: afraid, fearful, awful, dreadful, frightful, terrible, horrible, terrific, appalling
means: afraid ：指由于胆小或怯懦而不敢说或做某事。
fearful ：普通用词，既指外界情况变化而引起的恐惧，又指来自内心的害怕与焦虑。
awful ：指威严得令人害怕或敬畏，有一定的感情色彩。
dreadful ：指使人非常恐惧，毛骨悚然，也使人感到讨厌而退缩。
frightful ：指使人陷入短暂的惊恐或产生毛骨悚然的感觉。
terrible ：侧重指给人以长久的惊骇，极端的恐怖，令人难以忍受。
horrible ：指因骇人听闻的丑恶而令人毛骨悚然，着重厌恶的成分多于害怕。
terrific ：多指外表、形状或力量等的可怕。
appalling ：指既令害怕又使人惊异、胆寒。

sentence.Network_en: They made sure that he died a horrible death.
Loneliness can be horrible, but it need not remain that way.
sentence.Network_cn: 孤独可能会很可怕，但也并非一定如此。

sentence.Network_en: Unless you respect other people's religions, horrible mistakes and conflict will occur.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果不尊重别人的宗教信仰，就会祷下大错，酿成冲突。

高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... hopeless a. 没有希望的；不可救药的 horrible a. 令人恐惧的；恐怖的 horse n. 马.
可字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 可逆〖 reversible〗 可怕〖 awful;dire;terrible;horrible〗 可欺〖 canbebullied〗.
练习口语的经典句式，词组_百度知道 ... Hopefully!- 希望如此！ Horrible!- 好可怕！ Hot!- 好辣！.

list.abs: ...愁云惨雾。有汇丰员工向本报透露，昨日各部门纷纷向员工「派大信封」，员工害怕被主管接见会有什麽下场，场面「非常恐怖」（…
The most horrible thing is to quit and deserted , culminating in a seemingly sanctimonious pseudo - scholars ., 最可怕的事莫过于知难而退 , 临阵脱逃 , 继而变成一个道貌岸然的伪学者.
Stairwells are horrible places to be alone and the perfect crime spot ., 楼梯间是一个可怕的地方 , 容易让人形单影只 , 变成最好的犯罪场所.
《Before&nbsp;Sunr... ... It's horrible. 太恐怖了。 I'm glad because no one knows I'm here... 我很高兴没有人知道我在这儿.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin horribilis, from horrere 'tremble, shudder' (see horrid)

entry.def: If you describe something or someone as horrible, you do not like them at all.

entry.tran: 令人震惊的;使人恐惧的;让人极度反感的
entry.def: You can call something horrible when it causes you to feel great shock, fear, and disgust.

example.ex: Still the horrible shrieking came out of his mouth.
example.tran: 他的嘴里还是发出了恐怖的尖叫声。

entry.def: Horrible is used to emphasize how bad something is.

example.ex: That seems like a horrible mess that will drag on for years...
example.tran: 看起来那像是个会拖延多年的大烂摊子。

example.ex: Unless you respect other people's religions, horrible mistakes and conflict will occur.
example.tran: 如果不尊重别人的宗教信仰，就会祷下大错，酿成冲突。

sentences.sentence: "war is beyond all words horrible"- Winston Churchill

auth_sentence.res_content: It is a truly horrible time for New York.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a truly horrible time for New York.

auth_sentence.content: Was it really horrible or just bad and inconvenient?
auth_sentence.res_content: Was it really horrible or just bad and inconvenient?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Was it really horrible or just bad and inconvenient?

auth_sentence.res_content: It's conceivable he had a horrible family life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's conceivable he had a horrible family life.

stems_affixes.word_buile: abhor[v.憎恨,嫌恶]+ent表形容词→abhorrent可恨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人恐惧的,可怕的;极讨厌的,糟透的
stems_affixes.word_buile: horr颤抖,害怕+ible能……的→adj.令人恐惧的,可怕的;极讨厌的,糟透的

Sentence.sentence: Parking in this city is a horrible nightmare.

means.word_mean: 可怕的, 令人恐惧的

sentences.en: What a horrible thing to say!
sentences.cn: 说起来这是多么可怕的事情啊！

sentences.en: The decision they made was horrible.
sentences.cn: 他们做出的决定令人感到恐怖。

means.word_mean: 极不友好的, 令人很不愉快的; 极讨厌的

sentences.en: Don't be so horrible to me!

jushi.english: I have a horrible feeling we're going to miss the plane.
jushi.chinese: 我有种不好的感觉,我们会赶不上这班飞机。

jushi.english: His death was a horrible blow to me.
jushi.chinese: 他的死对我来说是个可怕的打击。
